arts.ttl: Real Madrid boss Carlo Ancelotti to miss Alavés clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti will not be on the touchline for the club’s next La Liga fixture. This comes owing to developments in Real’s latest outing. Los Blancos…

arts.ttl: Alavés boss confirms Joan Jordán’s apology to club’s squad
arts.sum: Deportivo Alavés head coach Eduardo Coudet has admitted that Joan Jordán issued a heartfelt apology to the club’s squad, on the back of their latest outing. This comes after the…

arts.ttl: Girona star the victim of sudden robbery on streets of Barcelona
arts.sum: Girona star Arthur Melo was the victim of an altogether unpleasant experience whilst out and about in Barcelona on Friday. That’s according to Mundo Deportivo, who have provided an insight…

Real Madrid and Barcelona have pulled away from the chasing pack as we head into gameweek 30 and Alex Wrigley has predictions for all 10 games in LaLiga.
